name: Mask of Madness
description: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: The caster goes berserk, gaining movement and attack speed, at the cost of armor and losing the ability to cast spells for a while.
notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Berserk grants its bonuses as a buff. Therefore, allies are unable to dispel (e.g. Oracle's Fortune's End) the silence.

abilities.name: Lifesteal
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks steal their target's life, healing the wielder for a portion of physical attack damage dealt.
notes: Only works with physical attack damage, does not work with magical or pure attack damage.
Does not work with physical or any other spell damage.
Does not work with instant attacks that do not trigger attack modifier.
Stacks additively with other lifesteal sources.
Treats illusions and creep-heroes as heroes.
Does not work on allied units, buildings, couriers, or ward-type units.

additionalInfo: Mask of Madness is the most cost-effective DPS and attack speed item in the game, costing only 17.27 Gold per point of attack speed.
